$!Taxis and private hire vehicles (PHV) in London must be inspected and licensed by Transport for London (TfL)$!

##Vehicle licences for London taxis##

To get your vehicle licence, your taxi must be inspected by TfL. It will need to meet the design and roadworthiness standards in the [TfL's 'Conditions of fitness'.](http://www.tfl.gov.uk/businessandpartners/taxisandprivatehire/1386.aspx "Conditions of fitness"){:rel="external"}

Your vehicle will need to be inspected before you renew your licence every 12 months.

Taxi vehicle licences are issued to the person applying for the licence. This must be a named individual (ie not a business or organisation) and the person shown as the registered keeper of the vehicle.

If you are the registered keeper of the taxi - but are not a [licensed taxi driver](/driving-licences-private-hire-taxis-london "Driving licences for private hire or taxis in London") or an [approved taxi owner](/operator-licences-private-hire-taxi-business-london "Operator licences for private hire or taxi business in London") - you'll need a Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) check before you can licence your vehicle.

###Taxi vehicle licence fee###

Licensing your taxi will cost £154. You will have to pay this when you book your appointment.

##Vehicle licences for private hire owners##

If you want to use a vehicle for private hire work, you'll need to have it licensed as a PHV by [TfL](http://www.tfl.gov.uk/businessandpartners/taxisandprivatehire/1362.aspx "Transport for London"){:rel="external"}. The only exemptions to this are vehicles used for weddings or funerals only.

Your PHV vehicle must:

- have no more than 8 passenger seats
- not look like a licensed taxis, eg London-style 'black cab' 
- only display advertising that complies with TfL guidelines 
- display licence discs - although exemptions are sometimes granted

Your vehicle will need to be inspected by TfL.

$D[Download ‘Private hire vehicle inspection manual version 7’ (PDF, 219KB)](http://www.tfl.gov.uk/assets/downloads/businessandpartners/phv-inspection-manual.pdf)$D

###PHV vehicle licence fee###

The current fee for a PHV vehicle licence in London is £114, including the application fee and the grant of the licence.

##Booking an inspection appointment##

To book an inspection appointment for your taxi or private hire vehicle call SGS.

$C
**SGS - inspection appointments**  
0845 378 2345
$C


*[TfL]: Transport for London
*[PHV]: Private hire vehicle
*[SCS]: Societe Generale de Surveillance 
*[CRB]: Criminal Records Bureau
overview: How to get your taxi or private hire vehicle a vehicle licence in London
title: Vehicle licences for private hire or taxis in London
